571:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-ādikarmikeṇa bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
571:2: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-iha subhūte ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni|
571:5: tānyeva cāsya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni|
571:6: evaṃ cāsmai prajñāpāramitāyā arthamupadekṣyanti-ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāyāṃ yojamāpadyasva,
571:7: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyasva|
571:10: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ,
571:11: evaṃ mā vedanāto mā saṃjñāto mā saṃskārebhyaḥ|
571:12: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vijñānataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ|
571:15: evaṃ yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra śīlaṃ rakṣasi..........peyālaṃ..............yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntyā saṃpādayasi,
571:18: yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoṣi,
571:20: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ|
571:21: evaṃ mā vedanāto mā saṃjñāto mā saṃskārebhyaḥ|
571:22: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vijñānataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ|
571:25: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā spṛhāṃ kārṣīriti|
571:26: evaṃ hi subhūte ādikarmiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nupūrveṇa kalyāṇamitraiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmavatārayitavyaḥ||
571:34: evaṃrūpāṃ prajñāmāgamya svādhīne'pi parinirvāṇe necchanti parinirvātum|
571:35: api tu paramaduḥkhitaṃ sattvadhātumabhisamīkṣya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ saṃsārānnotrasyanti|
571:37: duṣkarakārakāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ye lokahitāya saṃprasthitāḥ,
571:48: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti?
571:49: yāni tāni subhūte saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni lokasya,
571:53: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti|
571:54: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā santo lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhavanti?
571:55: ye subhūte sattvā jātidharmiṇo jarādharmiṇo vyādhidharmiṇo maraṇadharmiṇaḥ śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmiṇaḥ sattvāḥ tān sarvān jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimocayanti|
571:56: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhavanti|
571:57: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya layanaṃ bhavanti?
571:58: yatsubhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sattvebhyo'śleṣāya dharmaṃ deśayanti|
571:59: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya layanaṃ bhavanati|
571:83: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvadharmā asaṃśliṣṭā asaṃbaddhā iti jñānadarśanādaśleṣo bhavati|
571:84: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya layanaṃ bhavanti|
571:85: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti?
571:87: yathā ca subhūte pāraṃ tathā rūpam|
571:90: yathā ca subhūte pāraṃ tathā vijñānam|
571:95: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ pāraṃ tathā sarvadharmāḥ,
571:96: nanu bhagavan bodhisattvairmahāsattvairabhisaṃbuddhā evaṃ bhavanti sarvadharmāḥ|
571:106: evaṃ ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya enān dharmān deśayiṣyāmaḥ prakāśayiṣyāma ityupanidhyāyanti|
571:107: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti|
571:108: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya dvīpā bhavanti?
571:109: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ye pradeśā udakaparicchinnā bhavanti nadīṣu vā mahodadhiṣu vā,
571:121: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya dvīpā bhavanti|
571:122: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā santo lokasya ālokā bhavanti?
571:123: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo dīrgharātramavidyāṇḍakośapaṭalaparyavanaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ tamobhibhūtānāṃ prajñayā avabhāsayantaḥ sarvājñānatamondhakāraṃ vidhunvanti|
571:124: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya ālokā bhavanti|
571:125: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya pariṇāyakā bhavanti?
571:126: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo rūpasya prakṛtyanutpādānirodhāya dharmaṃ deśayanti|
571:135: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya pariṇāyakā bhavanti|
571:136: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya gatirbhagavanti?
571:137: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya ākāśagatikaṃ rupamiti dharmaṃ deśayanti|
571:140: evameva subhūte sarvadharmā ākāśagatikā anāgatikā agatikā ākāśasamāḥ|
571:142: evameva subhūte sarvadharmā anāgatā āgatā ākṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā asthitā asaṃsthitā avyavasthitā anutpannā aniruddhā ākāśakalpatvādavikalpāḥ|
571:145: na sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā|
571:148: na sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā|
571:150: na sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā|
571:191: ataśca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā santa ākāśagatikāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti|
571:192: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya gatirbhavanti||
571:194: bhagavānāha-ye subhūte caritāvino bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti paurvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike paripakvakuśalamūlāḥ,
571:195: te subhūte bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ ye imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmājñāsyanti|
571:200: subhūtirāha-kiṃ bhagavan evaṃgatikā eva te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti?
571:204: evaṃgatikā eva te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti|
571:205: enāmeva gatimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānām enāmeva gatiṃ deśayiṣyanti|
571:207: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ gatirbhaviṣyanti||
571:208: subhūtirāha- duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yenāyaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti|
571:210: duṣkarakārakaḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yenāyaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ-aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti|
571:211: sa khalu punarayaṃ subhūte saṃnāho bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya na rūpasaṃbaddho na rūpasyārthāya saṃbaddhaḥ|
571:215: na pratyekabuddhabhūmisaṃbaddho na pratyeka[buddha] bhūmerarthāya saṃbaddhaḥ|
571:218: sarvadharmāsaṃnaddho batāyaṃ subhūte saṃnāho bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya||
571:219: subhūtirāha-asya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya evaṃ gambhīrārāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratastrīṇi sthānāni na pratikāṅkṣitavyāni|
571:222: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-katamaṃ tvaṃ subhūte arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyannevaṃ vadasi-asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratastrīṇi sthānāni na pratikāṅkṣitavyāni|
571:225: asthānaṃ subhūte hyetadanavakāśo'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā|
571:226: api tu buddhabhūmirevāsya pratikāṅkṣitavyā yenāyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ||
571:235: na hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kaściddharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ|
571:243: ato hi subhūte gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vinivartanīya upaparīkṣitavyo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ-kaccitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nābhiniveśaṃ karoti|
571:245: kaccidbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parasya śraddhayā gacchati|
571:246: kaccitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
571:247: na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati na dhandhāyate avagāhate'dhimucyate'bhinandati prajñāpāramitāyā darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca|
571:250: tathā hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate||
571:251: subhūtirāha-yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
571:252: katamena bhagavan ākāreṇa tena prajñāpāramitā vyavacāritā bhavati?
571:253: bhagavānāha-sarvajñatānimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā vyavacāritā bhavati|
571:255: bhagavānāha-ākāśanimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā ākāśapravaṇayā ākāśaprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā sarvajñatānimnā saṃtatirvyavacāritā bhavati|
571:256: yā khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvajñatānimnayā saṃtatyā vyavacāraṇā,
571:262: na tadrūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na prāptirnābhisamayo nādhigamo na mārgo na mārgaphalaṃ na jñānaṃ na vijñānaṃ notpattirna vināśo notpādo na vyayo na nirodho na bhāvanā na vibhāvanā,
571:263: nāpi kenacitkṛtaṃ nāpi kutaścidāgataṃ nāpi kvacid gacchati nāpi kvaciddeśe nāpi kvacitpradeśe sthitam,
571:268: na rūpeṇa na vedanayā na saṃjñayā na saṃskārairna vijñānena na dānapāramitayā na śīlapāramitayā na kṣāntipāramitayā na vīryapāramitayā na dhyānapāramitayā na prajñāpāramitayā śakyā abhisaṃboddhum|
571:274: śīlapāramitaiva kṣāntipāramitaiva vīryapāramitaiva dhyānapāramitaiva prajñāpāramitaiva hi subhūte sarvajñatā||
571:275: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarairdevaputrairbrahmāpi sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ rūpāvacarairdevaputrairyena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ|
571:276: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthau|
571:277: ekānte sthitaśca śakro devendraḥ kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantametadavocat-gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā|
571:281: idamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhamātrasya bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya alpotsukatāyāṃ cittamavanataṃ na dharmadeśanāyām||
571:282: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ kāmāvacarāṃśca devaputrān brahmāṇaṃ ca sahāpatiṃ rūpāvacarāṃśca devaputrānāmantrayate sma-evametaddevaputrāḥ, evametat|
571:287: idamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhamātrasya bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya alpotsukatāyāṃ cittamavanataṃ na dharmadeśanāyām-gambhīro batāyaṃ mayā dharmo'bhisaṃbuddha iti,
571:288: yatra na kaścidabhisaṃbuddho na kaścidabhisaṃbhotsyate na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate|
571:294: evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ kāmāvacarāśca devaputrāḥ brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan-āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
571:297: anugrahāya ca bhagavan dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmo deśyate|
